name: Remove Bones Problem
description: Arthritis is a disease that causes stiffness and inflammation in the joints. It can affect men, women and children. An official diagnosis is usually made by a physician. Your doctor may examine your joints

name: No Back Pain
description: Many patients don’t realise this but back pain that isn’t managed properly can affect your immune system and interfere with the body’s healing process. So if you think doing nothing about your aches and niggles will leave you with only them to deal with, think again.

name: Dental Care
description: Our highly skilled, world class team of dentists in Dhaka provide a full range of cutting edge dental treatments with a wholly patient focused ethos. We have a range of specialists on site that can provide you with the latest treatments

name: Diabetes Care
description: Diabetes is a number of diseases that involve problems with the hormone insulin. Normally, the pancreas (an organ behind the stomach) releases insulin to help your body store and use the sugar and fat from the food you eat. Diabetes can occur when the pancreas produces very little or no insulin

name: Eye care
description: Ophthalmologists and optometrists both provide routine eye exams. Ophthalmologists are physicians (MDs) who have specialized in diagnosing and medically or surgically treating diseases of the eyes and visual system.
